as-select.query: select id, name from source_table where status = 'active'

table.name: test_table
table.comment: Test table with all Hive optional clauses

as-select.query: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.age, u.email, u.score, named_struct('city', u.city, 'street', u.street) AS address, split(u.hobbies, ',') AS hobbies, str_to_map(u.metadata, ',', '=') AS metadata, case when u.flag = 1 then create_union(0, u.id) else create_union(1, u.name) end AS info, ds.dt, u.country FROM source_users u JOIN dim_dates ds ON u.date_id = ds.date_id WHERE u.status = 'active'

column-definition.type: BLOB SUB_TYPE TEXT CHARACTER SET UTF8
